# isDrawingToScreen

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the drawing destination is the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDrawingToScreen: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the drawing destination is the screen. If the value of the property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] may mean that the drawing destination is a printer, but the destination may also be a PDF or EPS file. You can call [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGraphicsContext/attributes] to see if additional information is available about the drawing destination.

## Testing the Drawing Destination

- **currentContextDrawingToScreen()**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current context is drawing to the screen.
